shortDescription: Experience the romance of Paris in 5 days.
overviewDescription: Discover the iconic landmarks of Paris, indulge in French cuisine, and immerse yourself in the city's rich history and culture.
tourPlanShortDescription: Welcome to the beautiful city of Paris! Get ready for an unforgettable travel experience filled with history, culture, and iconic landmarks. Here's a detailed description of your travel plan

days: Day 2: Visit Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum

photoGallery.shortDescription: Indulge in the allure of Paris through our captivating Photo Gallery. Immerse yourself in the timeless elegance of the Eiffel Tower, wander the charming streets of Montmartre, and discover the artistic wonders of the Louvre. Be enchanted by the romantic ambiance, iconic landmarks, and cultural treasures that make Paris an unforgettable destination. Let our photos transport you to the City of Love.

shortDescription: Experience the energy of New York City.
overviewDescription: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of New York City, visit famous landmarks, enjoy Broadway shows, and savor diverse cuisines.
